mapper.select: --이 방법으로 하려면 root-context.xml에서 property name='url' 부분에 value에 -- -- jdbc:log4jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/mydb?allowMultiQueries=true 로 바꿔줘야함 SET @rownum:='0'; SELECT board.title as title , board.content as content , board.write_date as writeDate FROM (SELECT * FROM board order by write_date desc) as board limit 0,5
select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as page_no,board.* from (select * from board order by write_date desc) as board, (select @rownum:=0) temp limit ${offset},5;
